summary: 10+ years of information technology experience with major IT and energy companies. Experienced in quality inspection, defect prevention, assembly, troubleshooting, and building high-quality servers and sub-assemblies. Proficient in reading drawings, ensuring conformance to engineering specifications, and coordinating with cross-functional teams to maintain schedules. Strong problem solving, attention to detail, and ability to work independently or in teams.

experience.title: Technical Test and WIP Auditor
experience.description: Conducted 3PAR/EOS WIP audits, performed material inspections per specifications, reduced operator error from 77% to 9%, designed standard work and inspection plans, prepared quality test plans, organized inspection procedures, and coordinated quality systems to evaluate performance against engineering standards.

experience.title: Assembler
experience.description: Assembled components and subassemblies, including fitting, mounting, alignment, adjusting, and operational testing; performed repairs and in-depth troubleshooting; trained other personnel; read and interpreted drawings to ensure proper assembly and functionality; built various units and subassemblies with close tolerances.

experience.title: Site Engineer
experience.description: Gained experience in crimping, staking, screwing, bolting, riveting, welding, cementing, and press fits; read production drawings; installed finished assemblies or subassemblies in cases/cabinets; developed layout, parts fabrication, assembly, install and checkout operations for electrical/electronic assemblies and systems; fabricated and assembled chassis and panels from sketches and schematics.

certifications: HP ProLiant Tower Servers (ML: 310 G5, 330 G6, 350 G6, 370 G6)
HP ProLiant Rack Servers (DL: 120G6, 160G6, 165 G7, 180/185 G6)
3PAR Rack and Servers Assembly (F200, F400, Storage Systems, T400, T800)
